comment: A disjoint union of open intervals has volume equal to the sum of the volume of the intervals. (This proof does not use countable choice, unlike ~ voliun .) Lemma 565Ca of [Fremlin5] p. 213. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
